A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: By far the biggest disappointment of the year.  Doesn't advance the grand plot of starwars at all.  Doesn't answer any of the big questions left from the force awakens.  Wastes a significant amount of time on sub plots that don't advance the plot of the movie.  Adds a few new special effects\, that are totally un-necessary\, ie Laser shots that fire on an arc and bombers that actually \"drop\" bombs in space.  If this movie didn't have te starwars tag not a single person would be giving it a positive review.
